position: Junior Data Analyst Salaries in Dublin Area
positioninfo: How much does a Junior Data Analyst make in Dublin, Ireland? The average salary for a Junior Data Analyst is €33,139  in Dublin, Ireland. Salaries estimates are based on 11 salaries submitted anonymously to Glassdoor by Junior Data Analyst employees in Dublin, Ireland.
